short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The community owned and operated Quai Iron Age Testnet wallet (Deprecated).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Pelagus Wallet - Embark on Web3 with the first open-source Quai Network Wallet!

Set sail into the world of Web3 with Pelagus Wallet, your gateway to the revolutionary Quai Network testnet. Specifically designed to support Quai's multi-chain architecture and with support for both the native Quai token and QRC-20s, Pelagus is the ultimate destination for all users of Quai Network.

Unleash the Power of Quai Network:
As the first open-source wallet for Quai Network, Pelagus Wallet offers a familiar experience tailored to Quai Network's unique multi-chain construction. Seamlessly interact with apps within Quai's multi-chain ecosystem, make transactions, and manage your assets with ease. Whether you're an avid DeFi user, an NFT enthusiast, or simply want to hold tokens, Pelagus Wallet caters to all users of Quai Network. Experience the full potential of Quai's ecosystem with all the tools you need right at your fingertips.

Need Assistance on Your Voyage?
We've got your back. Our dedicated support team is ready to assist you. Reach out to us at support@pelaguswallet.io for any queries or guidance along the way.

Set sail with Pelagus Wallet today to explore the ocean of possibilities on Quai Network.
